first_para: John Charles Baron (born 21 June 1959) is a British Conservative politician and the Member of Parliament for Basildon and Billericay. Baron has frequently rebelled against his own party, particularly in opposing military intervention in the Middle East and the European Union.

full.extract: John Charles Baron (born 21 June 1959) is a British Conservative politician and the Member of Parliament for Basildon and Billericay. Baron has frequently rebelled against his own party, particularly in opposing military intervention in the Middle East and the European Union.
full.title: John Baron (politician)
